string.text: Do you have connections to all the factions here?
Sure, what's the matter?
I want to become a member of a different faction.
I have trouble with a certain faction.
I'm not made for groups. I want to be a loner again!
Freedom guys are right, we need anarchy!
I feel Duty are doing the right thing, keeping newbies away!
Damn all these wannabe-hero loners! Bandits for the win!
They told me as a Merc I will get rich! I want that!
I shouldn't shoot, I should research! Make me an Ecologist!
Are you in contact with the recruitment center? I want to join the military!
The Monolith calls me. Need to go north. Go north ...
Flesh! Moar flesh! Must eat brain!
Yes, I'm sure!
No, I changed my mind.
Nevermind.
Looks like you had some trouble with them... \nIn addition to the regular price, they demand a bounty to be paid.\nThat's 60.000 RU! Sure you want to do it?
Looks like you had some trouble with them... \nIn addition to the regular price, they demand a bounty to be paid.\nThat's 60.000 RU! Do you have the money?
No.
Everything alright. My fault.
Okay
It's all done!
Good luck on your new path!
I must have killed some popular stalker. They've put a bounty on my head!
Freedom pals are angry! They will listen to you, right?
Duty soldiers have order to kill me, please help!
I got spoofed by the bandits. Pay them to save my life!
The Mercenaries are hunting me down. Stop them!
The Ecologists are throwing cotton balls at me! It hurts!
The Soldiers have order to kill me, please make contact to the military.
Monolith fanatics got brainwashed against me. Please help!
Zoombiies are maad! Do something!
Yes, help me getting this fixed.
No, I'm uncertain.
You will have to pay 40.000 RU to calm them down. Okay?
You have some friends in common? The price is only 10.000 RU!\nDo you want me to sign you up?
You have some friends in common? The price is only 10.000 RU!\nDo you have the money?
You don't seem to have any relations to them yet.\nThey demand 20.000 RU. Do you want me to sign you up?
You don't seem to have any relations to them yet.\nThey demand 20.000 RU. Do you have the money?
Damn!
Looks like you're hunted and broke, poor boy.
Uhm ... yeah ... well. 10.000 RU?
Uhm ... yeah ... well. 20.000 RU?
Uhm ... yeah ... well. 60.000 RU?
Go north ...
What? North! No! It's me! Marked One!
Mmmnnnnaaaahhhaa!
Mrrr!

So, you wan't to be someone else right from the start?
Once you change the sides, you cannot simply switch back!
You'll have to pay me for any further deals!
Are you sure you want this?
These documents grant unrestricted access to the zone.
The documents are valid. You may pass.
Thank you!
The area is off limits!
Alright, keep moving!
You're now a full member of freedom!
Okay, leave now.
I want to discuss something with you...
I want to join Duty!
Okay, we didn't have trouble with you, but you aren't our friend either. \nThe price is 20.000 RU.
We would be glad to have you with us! \nWe need only 10.000 RU for the equipment.
Okay, I agree!
No, I changed my mind.
I want to get out of Duty and be a loner again.
I want to get out of Freedom and be a loner again.
We are sorry to hear that. Are you sure?
Yes, I'm sure!
I want to join Freedom!
You know what?
I want to protect the Scientists!
Surely we could use some help. \nYou've already proven yourself by retrieving the documents. \nBut I still need 10.000 RU as deposit for the equipment.
Surely we could use some help. \nYou've already proven yourself by retrieving the documents. \nBut I still need 20.000 RU as deposit for the equipment.
Good to have you with us!
All these formulas, equations and petri-dishes! I can't stand it anymore! \nI have to stay away from science for a while!

There are rumors that you've killed one of us. \nLet's hope for you that those are just rumors! \nYou can join us for a small fee of 60.000 RU, but keep in the back of your head, if we confirm you are that killer, we'll feed you to the boars alive. Sounds good?
